DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect luteal phase supplement ( LPS ) pregnancy rate IUI cycle stimulate clomiphene citrate .
DOC.brief_title: Luteal Support Intrauterine Insemination ( IUI ) With Clomiphene Citrate
DOC.criteria: Age ≤ 36 year Body mass index 18 29 Presence ovary Basal level estradiol ( ≤ 80 pg/ml ) progesterone ( ≤ 1.6ng/ml ) day one cycle day three FSH level < 12IU/L Patients enter study . Only first IUI attempt include ( 2nd 3 rd attempt progesterone could administrate necessary attempt exclude study ) Normal HSG ( maximum 3 month prior start stimulation ) . Donor sperm include Polycystic ovarian syndrome ( Rotterdam criterion ) Endometriosis ( ≥AFS III )
